name: SelectiveCheckoutReborn
description: Checkout only the folders that are required for the build
author: NicoDGK

inputs.name: pathsToCheckout
inputs.label: paths to checkout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Paths, relative to the repository root. One path per line.

inputs.name: fetchDepth
inputs.label: fetch depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: The depth parameter is a number greater than 0 that specifies how deep you want to do sparse-checkout. The default is 1, which clones only the immediate files and folders at the root of the repository. A value of 0 means all history is cloned.
